item.title: PHOTO EDITING
item.dc:creator: proistak
item.content:encoded:
Your bones don't break, mine do. That's clear. Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine. You don't get sick, I do. That's also clear. But for some reason, you and I react the exact same way to water. We swallow it too fast, we choke.[section swatch="swatch-orange"] [row] [span3] [image size="box-big" swatch="swatch-nephritis" source="http://themes.oxygenna.com/swatch/files/2013/08/camera-800x800.png" icon=""] [/span3] [span9]

Photo Editing

Your bones don't break, mine do. That's clear. Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine. You don't get sick, I do. That's also clear. But for some reason, you and I react the exact same way to water. We swallow it too fast, we choke.

He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me! I should've known way back when... You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.

He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me! I should've known way back when... You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.

item.title: INTEGER SOLLICITUDIN
item.dc:creator: proistak
item.content:encoded: Elit sit amet ultricies vestibulum, diam libero.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind. Like it knows it killed the world once and got a taste for murder. After the avalanche, it took us a week to climb out. Now, I don't know exactly when we turned on each other, but I know that seven of us survived the slide... and only five made it out. Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Do you see a slender plastic tag clipped to my shirt with my name printed on it? Do you see a little Asian child with a blank expression on his face sitting outside on a mechanical helicopter that shakes when you put quarters in it? No? Well, that's what you see at a toy store. And you must think you're in a toy store, because you're here shopping for an infant named Jeb.

item.title: QUISQUE PORTA
item.dc:creator: proistak
item.content:encoded:
[gallery ids="495,496"] You think water moves fast? You should see ice.

It moves like it has a mind. Like it knows it killed the world once and got a taste for murder. After the avalanche, it took us a week to climb out. Now, I don't know exactly when we turned on each other, but I know that seven of us survived the slide... and only five made it out.

Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Do you see a slender plastic tag clipped to my shirt with my name printed on it? Do you see a little Asian child with a blank expression on his face sitting outside on a mechanical helicopter that shakes when you put quarters in it? No? Well, that's what you see at a toy store. And you must think you're in a toy store, because you're here shopping for an infant named Jeb.

Your cells react to bacteria and viruses

Your bones don't break, mine do. That's clear. Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine. [section swatch="swatch-orange"] [row] [span3] [image size="box-big" swatch="swatch-greensea" icon="icon-camera"] [/span3] [span9]

Your bones don't break, mine do. That's clear. Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine. You don't get sick, I do. That's also clear. But for some reason, you and I react the exact same way to water. We swallow it too fast, we choke.

He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me! I should've known way back when... You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.

item.dc:creator: proistak
item.content:encoded:
[section swatch="swatch-orange"] [row] [span3] [image size="box-big" source="http://themes.oxygenna.com/swatch/files/2013/08/clipboard2-800x800.png" swatch="swatch-greensea" icon=""] [/span3] [span9]

APP DESIGN

Your bones don't break, mine do. That's clear. Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine. You don't get sick, I do. That's also clear. But for some reason, you and I react the exact same way to water. We swallow it too fast, we choke.

He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me! I should've known way back when... You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.

item.title: Font icons
item.dc:creator: proistak
item.content:encoded:
[section title="Examples" swatch="swatch-greensea"]

One font, 249 icons

In a single collection, Font Awesome is a pictographic language of web-related actions.

 CSS control

Easily style icon color, size, shadow, and anything that's possible with CSS.

 Infinite scalability

Scalable vector graphics means every icon looks awesome at any size.

 Free, as in Beer

Font Awesome is completely free for commercial use. Check out the license.

 IE7 Support

Font Awesome supports IE7. If you need it, you have my condolences.

 Perfect on Retina Displays

Font Awesome icons are vectors, which mean they're gorgeous on high-resolution displays.

 Made for Twitter Bootstrap

Designed from scratch to be fully compatible with Twitter Bootstrap 2.2.2.

 Designer Friendly

Install FontAwesome.otf and visit the copy & paste page.Happy designing.

 Screen reader compatible

Font Awesome won't trip up screen readers, unlike other icon fonts.
[/section] [section title="Web application icons" swatch="swatch-coral"]

item.title: This theme is so nice!
item.dc:creator: proistak
item.content:encoded: You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind. Like it knows it killed the world once and got a taste for murder. Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Like you, I used to think the world was this great place where everybody lived by the same standards I did, then some kid with a nail showed me and you must think you're in a toy store.<!--more-->[row][span6]You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind. Like it knows it killed the world once and got a taste for murder. After the avalanche, it took us a week to climb out. Now, I don't know exactly when we turned on each other, but I know that seven of us survived the slide... and only five made it out. Now we took an oath, that I'm breaking now. We said we'd say it was the snow that killed the other two, but it wasn't.Nature is lethal but it doesn't hold a candle to man. Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Do you see a slender plastic tag clipped to my shirt with my name printed on it? Do you see a little Asian child with a blank expression on his face sitting outside on a mechanical helicopter that shakes when you put quarters in it? No? Well, that's what you see at a toy store. And you must think you're in a toy store, because you're here shopping for an infant named Jeb. [/span6][span6] Like you, I used to think the world was this great place where everybody lived by the same standards I did, then some kid with a nail showed me I was living in his world, a world where chaos rules not order, a world where righteousness is not rewarded. That's Cesar's world, and if you're not willing to play by his rules, then you're gonna have to pay the price. The lysine contingency - it's intended to prevent the spread of the animals is case they ever got off the island. Dr. Wu inserted a gene that makes a single faulty enzyme in protein metabolism. The animals can't manufacture the amino acid lysine. Unless they're continually supplied with lysine by us, they'll slip into a coma and die. Well, the way they make shows is, they make one show. That show's called a pilot. Then they show that show to the people who make shows, and on the strength of that one show they decide if they're going to make more shows. [/span6][/row]
